DOC.detailed_description: This study aim adapt pilot test two core element organize care program ( systematic telephone outreach monitoring improve quality continuity pharmacotherapy , structure psychoeducational group program focus patient activation self-management ) population-based sample patient chronic recurrent depression . Two form group self-management training evaluate : Peer-Led Chronic Disease Self-Management Group ( develop Lorig colleague ) Therapist-Led Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy Group . Approximately 100 patient chronic recurrent depression randomly assign one four condition : 1 ) usual care ; 2 ) phone care management ; 3 ) phone care management plus peer-led self-management group ; 4 ) phone care management plus therapist-led CBT group . Blinded assessment examine clinical outcome ( SCL depression score , depression diagnosis SCID ) , functional outcome , process variable ( self-efficacy managing depression , use cop strategy ) 12 month . If patient choose participate treatment , reason dropout assess . The data collect provide:1 ) evaluation feasibility acceptability ( include recruitment , intervention uptake continued participation ) intervention program ; 2 ) preliminary evaluation effectiveness , i.e. , effect intervention patient outcomes process care ; 3 ) information inform design implementation full-scale effectiveness trial ( refinement intervention program measurement strategy , necessary sample size ) .
